thread.title: Homeless Bulldog Who Could Not See Gets Second Chance
thread.title_full: Homeless Bulldog Who Could Not See Gets Second Chance

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Homeless Bulldog Who Could Not See Gets Second Chance
text:
Homeless Bulldog Who Could Not See Gets Second Chance   
When the American Bulldog “Dude” arrived at Vet Ranch he could hardly see and he looked like he was always squinting. That’s because his lids were rolling in to his eyes so much that the extra skin was inflamed and blocking his vision. 
His eyes were a mess, but Dr. Matt decided to help fix him and find him a home. 
Warning: there are scenes of surgery in this video from 3:06 to 4:53 that are graphic and may disturb some viewers. 
Share Dude’s rescue story with your family and friends.
